alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:32PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Hamilton and central Herkimer Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 931 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Lewey Lake Campground to 15 miles south of Limekiln Lake Campground to near Northwood. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Lake Pleasant, Lewey Lake Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Nobleboro, Atwell, Perkins Clearing, Wheelertown, Rudeston, West Canada Lakes, Herkimer Landing, Caswell Lake, Mountain Home, Sled Harbor, Wilmurt, Piseco, Wilmurt Corners, Morehouseville, Hoffmeister and North Wilmurt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
